attributes.action: Force Network Rail to employ one Fat Controller at every station for the amusement of commuters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That's it really, but maybe all train drivers could also be made to go Whoo Whoo Che cuff che cuff che cuff as the train pulls out of every station.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
